channel.title: public-policy on Daniel Antal, CFA
channel.description: Recent content in public-policy on Daniel Antal, CFA

item.title: Comparing Social Distancing in Europe
item.description: Based on the locational data of various smartphones and application data, we know that people spend 10-15% more time at home since January, and 40-50% less in their workplaces. Similar data is available for other locations.
